title: Start
body:
<<set $gameover to false>>

Ivory: Ha...
Ivory: Whiskey please.

title: GetGlassDrink1
body:
<<set $rightdrink to 0>>
Ivory: Thanks.
Ivory: It's been a while since I ended up here.
Ivory: I don't think I've seen you?
Ivory: You new?

[[Yes|2A]]
[[No, not really|2B]]

title: 2A
body:
Ivory: Oh. Okay.
Ivory: Wonder what happened to the last bartender.
Ivory: Doesn't matter though.
Ivory: I've missed this.
Ivory: ...Hey.
Ivory: Can I get another?

title: 2B
body:
Ivory: Huh.
Ivory: I must've been away longer than I thought.
Ivory: Doesn't matter though.
Ivory: I've missed this.
Ivory: ...Hey.
Ivory: Can I get another?

title: GetNotDrink1
body:
<<set $rightdrink to 2>>

Ivory: Thanks...?
Ivory: Sigh.
Ivory: It's been a while since I ended up here.
Ivory: I don't think I've seen you?
Ivory: You new?

[[Yes|2A]]
[[No, not really|2B]]

title: GetDrink1
body:
<<set $rightdrink to 1>>

Ivory: Uh...this is a lot.
Ivory: Can't you just give it to me in a glass? Or something?

title: 3A
body:
Customer: Hah. You're just doing your job.
Customer: ...
Customer: Thank you.
Customer: Well, that's it for today then.
Customer: I'll be back, unfortunately.
Customer: Good-bye.

<<set $gameover to true>>
<<customerleave Dialogue>>

title: 3B
body:
Ivory: Bet I didn't help with that.
Ivory: Haha...
Ivory: 

<<set $gameover to true>>
<<customerleave Dialogue>>

title: GetGlassDrink2
body:
<<if $rightdrink < 2>>
Ivory: Thanks.
<<else>>
Ivory: Hey, you got it right this time.
Ivory: Haha.
<<endif>>

<<set $rightdrink to 0>>

Ivory: This is some smooth whiskey.
Ivory: Thanks again.
Ivory: Nice break from all the shit that's been happening.


[[What's been happening?|3A]]
[[You know it.|3B]]

title: GetNotDrink2
body:
<<if $rightdrink < 2>>
Ivory: Uhh.
Ivory: Did I not order whiskey the first time...?
<<else>>
Ivory: Okay.
Ivory: Uh.
Ivory: I know you're new and all, but seriously?
<<endif>>

<<set $rightdrink to 2>>

Ivory: Whatever.
Ivory: It's not the worst thing that happened today, I guess.

[[What's the worst thing?|3A]]
[[Sorry.|3C]]

title: GetDrink2
body:
<<if $rightdrink is 1>>
Ivory: Again?
Ivory: C'mon, man. Just put it in a cup...
<<else>>
Ivory: Uh...this is a lot.
Ivory: Can't you just give it to me in a glass? Or something?
<<endif>>
